text: Sophie Gengembre Anderson (1823 â€“ 10 March 1903) was a French-born British artist. She created many paintings of children and women. Her work Elaine was the first public collection of a female artist. Anderson also painted No Walk Today and many other paintings. She was born in Paris, France. She died in Falmouth, England. ==References== Category:British painters Category:1823 births Category:1903 deaths Category:Artists from Paris
title: Sophie Gengembre Anderson
